title: Mobile-Based Music Appreciation Education: Comparative Study of Web vs. Game Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic music theory and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: 10-minute learning modules using mobile devices, with three weekly sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain the historical background and musical characteristics of various music genres (classical, jazz, pop, etc.) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify and explain at least three key elements (harmony, rhythm, instrumentation, etc.) when analyzing musical works.
Learners can comparatively evaluate the effectiveness differences between web-based and game-based learning in mobile environments with 70% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
